title: @ Riot- Any Word on the Next Vel'Koz/Nami skin?
body:
I need another skin for these champs.
Nami's last skin was last April and Vel was last January (plus, he only has 2 skins..not including default obviously)

Please Riot..any hint as to when maybe a new skin for one of these champs will be revealed?

replies.body:
Hey! 

Unfortunately, we're not able to discuss what may or may not be in development. Sorry!
Please, take a moment of silence to mourn KateyKhaos having to remain silent of her beloved Nami.
